Pondicherry Engineering College (or PEC) is an engineering institution situated in South India on East Coast Road in Pondicherry, Puducherry on the exact border of Tamil Nadu and Pondicherry.
The college is an institution sponsored by the Union Territory of Puducherry. The college was started in 1984 under the VII Five Year Plan. PEC is an autonomous institution for the purposes of administration, staff recruitment and College development and is managed by a Board of Governors. The college is autonomous for Undergraduate acedamic purposes also. And affiliated to the Pondicherry University for Postgraduate and Phd academic purposes. The institute offers eight Undergraduate, eight Postgraduate and PhD programme in the disciplines of engineering and technology.

It is a government college that will allow to get placed at better companies . But if you are an average student or below you will surely suffer alot. Although some professors are exceptional, professors here wont teach you the ABC....you need to know the ABC from schools onwards. In terms of infrastructure only the Administration block and the theatres are the only buildings that can be taken into consideration. Hostels are horrible (No need to explain here). The campus is a jungle full of wild animals. There is no ambulance provided in case of emergency (like snake bite or scorpion bite). 
 Actually it is a college for the localite only and not for other states students. Other states students need to pay extra money for the college tuition fee. The hostel fee has reached similar to that of private colleges. 
 It is under pondicherry university, from my experience it is the worst university I have ever seen. Full of corruption. By chance if you have arrear and you want to apply for revaluation. Then my request is don't waste your money for revaluation. There is no transparency on how they re-evaluate your paper. And it will reflect on your mark sheet that when others got the mark sheet and you will not get it. 
 So choose your college wisely before you regret it. :)

College_Name: Rajiv Gandhi College of Engineering and Technology
Reviews: Rightfully the best one in pondicherry. I started my first year as a stranger and I was never spared to be an aghorophobian thereafter. The culture right from non-teaching staffs to head of the institution is fanta-fabulous. Best infrastructure and students have their own legacy to think free and improvise themselves. The management has now started to focus on student's ability in other domains rather than academics during weekends. The fees structure is so cool comparatively and the method of implementing syllabus into students is a perfect fit. Together we live as a family and we welcome every permanent guest to this beautiful ambience. PROUD TO BE RGCETIAN

College_Name: Rajiv Gandhi College of Engineering and Technology
Reviews: I'm an undergraduate from the department of ECE from RGCET, which is one of the pioneers in pondicherry. And now i'm in my final year and i have got placed in Wipro private Ltd through "Wipro - Elite NLTH 2019" an online test conducted by wipro. The placement trainings that are provided by the institution is also helped me for this. I cannot say anything favourable to the management and also not against it. My small advice would be nothing new but assistive that wherever we are, we should have the insight to shape our future."No one will tell you what to do next in your life as you are already 18". Now you are on your own. So be an extraordinary personage. And inevitably, we can never blame others for our life. Happy engineering : )

Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering College (SMVEC) is an engineering college in Puducherry union territory, India. The college was established in 1999 to provide technical education to young citizens.

The institution is affiliated to Pondicherry University and is approved by All India Council for Technical Education.

Best college in puducherry. Good infrastructure lab facilities classroom facilities well and good. It is one of the most famous Engineering college in puducherry. They will treat friendly whatever it is.

Sri Manakula Vinayagar Engineering Collegewas established in the year 1999. The institution has been approved by AICTE, New Delhi and affiliated to Pondicherry University. It is the first institution in Pondicherry State which got ISO 9001:2000 Certification and established the 'Nila Community Radio Station' with the approval of Government of India. It is the First engineering institution in Puducherry which is accredited by NAAC with 'A' grade. It is also accredited by the IT giant Tata Consultancy Services (TCS). Within a short span, the institution has attained an enviable reputation by possessing all the hall marks of premier Institution in pursuit of excellence. The Institution aims at equipping budding professionals with excellent theoretical and practical knowledge. It also takes pride in developing the students with leadership and interpersonal skills and thus shaping them as strategic scholars with competitive spirits who will be capable of delivering their best in the technological world.

Sri manakula vinayagar institute of technology Nestled in the vast expanse of the agricultural lands of Kalitheerthalkuppam on the Pondicherry-Villupuram main road, Manakula Vinayagar Institute of Technology is the 10th and the most recent edifice that spells modernity and technological advance even as a classically architecture temple of the elephant-faced GOD welcomes the entrant with the deity bestowing intelligence and supernatural powers upon those who worship him with closed palms and an open heart.

	Manakula Vinayagar Institute of Technology, with its motto, Educate, Empower and Excel, has risen to meet the ever increasing need for consummate technologists who would usher in a better tomorrow that would free people from the clutches of old world ideas. MIT is a self-financing technical institute started in 2008 by Sri Manakula Vinayagar Educational Trust with the aim to make state-of-the-art technology to the rural society and to open up career opportunities for the underprivileged youth in and around the vicinity.

	The college is approved by AICTE and affiliated to Pondicherry University. It provides an ambience of uncompromised innovation, excellence and quality. Its library houses over 18343 books and 474 e-journals and magazines for the benefit of the students.

The college is very okayish infrastructure wise , and you will be shot at tremendously with some Hectic work everyday, you will not feel like doing your homework/assigned everyday work when you see the amount of work given.the staffs show partiality towards certain students.The staffs also ask the students to do some work that is personal to them i.e something unofficial towards the college.but one good habit here is that they don't like to fail their students in the semester exams .the internal's are conducted normally,but then if you fail the internal you have to stay back up to 6 pm . MY conclusion is that the student will go through extremely high mental pressure and won't have rest ,not even second saturday's are holidays.no rest ,no peace,no life(you wouldn't even get the slightest of a college environment rather a school like experience).
It is good place to learn and explore new things.

Hi This is Sarath From Final IT.i would like share my thoughts in my perspective .The point here is Academics Syllabus coverage is given more preference than Sports and other Activities.8 hours class is something very bad ,the management should encourage the students to learn not to compel.Internals are Conducted in Good way but when a candidate fails to clear the Particular subject He is been made to Stay till 6.00 Pm that is something very bad, it changes the mindset of the person,the student is mentally distracted.Speaking about Discipline students(boys) are asked to be in Perfect formals and clean shave but sometimes it is handled in a harsh way by sending them to home morning itself.it can be Changed.Department Symposium are been conducted for that Clg should Help Financially because it is for the betterment of students.The Next thing is Industrial Visit ,the crucial thing here is students are been restricted by the Management that the Company or place should be within chennai.When it comes to restriction the motive of the Visit is been totally changed...Thanks /////////////
